original_title: Dialog Enterprise enables digital transformation of MBSL with Dialog SD-WAN solution
original_body_lines: Dialog Enterprise, the ICT solutions arm of Dialog Axiata PLC, helped enable the digital transformation initiative of Merchant Bank of Sri Lanka & Finance PLC (MBSL) by successfully completing the deployment of its Secure Software-Defined Wide Area Networking (SD-WAN). MBSL has a rich history of being the country’s pioneer specialists in trade finance and investment banking and is committed to offering the best solutions for its customers’ financial aspirations while creating a platform and atmosphere for its employees to perform at their best.

By deploying Secure SDWAN from Dialog Enterprise, MBSL has not only improved its IT capabilities but also empowered and unleashed its potential for digitization. With enhanced security, reliability, and performance, MBSL is now better equipped to leverage digital technologies and offer cutting-edge services to its customers.
